publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4873 Richard Lochhead: Rome was Built on Seven Hills. Dufftown was Built on Seven Stills—That the Parliament welcomes the Speyside Autumn Whisky Festival held in Dufftown from 22 to 25 September 2006; notes the often repeated phrase "Rome was built on seven hills. Dufftown was built on seven stills" and the important role which Dufftown has played in putting Moray on the map as the centre of Speyside whisky production; recognises the vital jobs provided by the industry in distilleries, transportation and tourism, and congratulates the industry on achieving record levels of sales by capturing new markets, resulting in whisky contributing £2 billion per year to the balance of trade.

S2M-4873 Richard Lochhead: Rome was Built on Seven Hills. Dufftown was Built on Seven Stills—That the Parliament welcomes the Speyside Autumn Whisky Festival held in Dufftown from 22 to 25 September 2006; notes the often repeated phrase "Rome was built on seven hills. Dufftown was built on seven stills" and the important role which Dufftown *and Speyside have played in making Moray globally recognised as the home of whisky*; recognises the vital jobs provided by the industry in distilleries, transportation and tourism, and congratulates the industry on achieving record levels of sales by capturing new markets, resulting in whisky contributing £2 billion per year to the balance of trade. Supported by: Michael Matheson*

S2M-4873 Richard Lochhead: Rome was Built on Seven Hills. Dufftown was Built on Seven Stills—That the Parliament welcomes the Speyside Autumn Whisky Festival held in Dufftown from 22 to 25 September 2006; notes the often repeated phrase "Rome was built on seven hills. Dufftown was built on seven stills" and the important role which Dufftown and Speyside have played in making Moray globally recognised as the home of whisky; recognises the vital jobs provided by the industry in distilleries, transportation and tourism, and congratulates the industry on achieving record levels of sales by capturing new markets, resulting in whisky contributing £2 billion per year to the balance of trade. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Rob Gibson*, Derek Brownlee*
S2M-4873 Rome was Built on Seven Hills. Dufftown was Built on Seven Stills (lodged on 26 September 2006) John Swinburne*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4873 Rome was Built on Seven Hills. Dufftown was Built on Seven Stills (lodged on 26 September 2006) Dave Petrie*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Donald Gorrie*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4873 Rome was Built on Seven Hills. Dufftown was Built on Seven Stills (lodged on 26 September 2006) Eleanor Scott*
